snippet: The Paris-based group said comparable sales at its fashion and leather goods unit had slowed to 3 percent, from 10 percent in the earlier quarter.
abstract: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton reports that sales slowed 3 percent in third quarter of 2015, down from 10 percent in previous quarter; blames stock market collapse in China for decline in sales.
lead_paragraph: The Paris-based group said comparable sales at its fashion and leather goods unit had slowed to 3 percent, from 10 percent in the earlier quarter.

headline.main: LVMH Says China’s Market Affected Its Quarterly Sales
headline.print_headline: Lvmh Reports China’s Market Affected Its Quarterly Sales

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
